name: x402-monorepo
description: HTTP-native economic authorization middleware for Web2 backends
author: x402 Contributors

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:adapters && npm run build:gateway
scripts.build:adapters: cd packages/adapter-coinbase && npm run build && cd ../adapter-thirdweb && npm run build && cd ../adapter-mock && npm run build
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:core && npm run typecheck:adapters && npm run typecheck:gateway
scripts.typecheck:adapters: cd packages/adapter-coinbase && npm run typecheck && cd ../adapter-thirdweb && npm run typecheck && cd ../adapter-mock && npm run typecheck
